name: Super Happy Singh
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: Pentium Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: HD4400 Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This is the game from hell. Definitely not designed for the keyboard since WASD does not provide the correct directions.  And pressing spacebar to jump does not work when you are already pressing two other keys to go diagonally down.   Recommendation: Save your Money.
